description: Mechanoregulation and pathology of YAP/TAZ via Hippo and non-Hippo mechanisms. This pathway was created based on figure 2 from Dobrokhotov et al. Phosphorylation sites were added based on information from PhosphoSitePlus, www.phosphosite.org.
title: Mechanoregulation and pathology of YAP/TAZ via Hippo and non-Hippo mechanisms
